languages.text: "Вы правите целым протекторатом — мне бы и в голову не пришло судить о вас по одному инциденту. Если вам показалось, что я порицаю вас, так это у меня лицо такое. И голос. И выбор слов. Да, тяжело переключиться на обычную беседу после стольких лет, проведенных за допросами..."

"You are the ruler of an entire protectorate — I would not presume to judge you based on a single incident. If it seems like I am censuring you, that's just my face. And voice. And choice of words. It really is hard to readjust to normal conversation after so many years spent in interrogation rooms..."
languages.original_text: "Вы правите целым протекторатом — мне бы и в голову не пришло судить о вас по одному инциденту. Если вам показалось, что я порицаю вас, так это у меня лицо такое. И голос. И выбор слов. Да, тяжело переключиться на обычную беседу после стольких лет, проведенных за допросами..."

It really is hard to readjust to normal conversation after so many years spent in interrogation rooms..."

languages.text: 「あなたは保護領全体を治める統治者です。私ごときが、たった一つの出来事であなたを判断するなど、そのようなおこがましいことはできません。もし私が非難しているように見えるなら、それは単にこの顔と声と、言葉の選び方のせいです。何年も尋問室で過ごした後では、普通の会話に戻るのはなかなか難しいものです…」
languages.original_text: "You are the ruler of an entire protectorate — I would not presume to judge you based on a single incident. If it seems like I am censuring you, that's just my face. And voice. And choice of words. It really is hard to readjust to normal conversation after so many years spent in interrogation rooms..."

traits.locale_text: 「あなたは保護領全体を治める統治者です。私ごときが、たった一つの出来事であなたを判断するなど、そのようなおこがましいことはできません。もし私が非難しているように見えるなら、それは単にこの顔と声と、言葉の選び方のせいです。何年も尋問室で過ごした後では、普通の会話に戻るのはなかなか難しいものです…」

languages.text: "Ihr herrscht über ein ganzes Protektorat – ich würde es nie wagen, über Euch aufgrund eines einzigen Vorfalls zu richten. Sollte es so aussehen, als würde ich Euch tadeln, so liegt das nur an meinem Gesicht. Und an meiner Stimme. Und an meiner Wortwahl. Es ist wirklich schwierig, normale Gespräche zu führen, wenn man so viele Jahre in Verhörräumen verbracht hat ..."
languages.original_text: "You are the ruler of an entire protectorate — I would not presume to judge you based on a single incident. If it seems like I am censuring you, that's just my face. And voice. And choice of words. It really is hard to readjust to normal conversation after so many years spent in interrogation rooms..."

traits.locale_text: "Ihr herrscht über ein ganzes Protektorat – ich würde es nie wagen, über Euch aufgrund eines einzigen Vorfalls zu richten. Sollte es so aussehen, als würde ich Euch tadeln, so liegt das nur an meinem Gesicht. Und an meiner Stimme. Und an meiner Wortwahl. Es ist wirklich schwierig, normale Gespräche zu führen, wenn man so viele Jahre in Verhörräumen verbracht hat ..."

languages.text: « Vous êtes à la tête d'un protectorat tout entier. Il ne me viendrait pas à l'esprit de vous juger sur un unique incident comme celui-ci. Si jamais je vous ai donné l'impression du contraire, sachez qu'il ne s'agit que de l'expression naturelle de mon visage. Et de ma voix. Et de mon vocabulaire. Il est particulièrement difficile de se réhabituer aux conversations normales après tant d'années passées en salle d'interrogatoire... »
languages.original_text: "You are the ruler of an entire protectorate — I would not presume to judge you based on a single incident. If it seems like I am censuring you, that's just my face. And voice. And choice of words. It really is hard to readjust to normal conversation after so many years spent in interrogation rooms..."

traits.locale_text: « Vous êtes à la tête d'un protectorat tout entier. Il ne me viendrait pas à l'esprit de vous juger sur un unique incident comme celui-ci. Si jamais je vous ai donné l'impression du contraire, sachez qu'il ne s'agit que de l'expression naturelle de mon visage. Et de ma voix. Et de mon vocabulaire. Il est particulièrement difficile de se réhabituer aux conversations normales après tant d'années passées en salle d'interrogatoire... »

languages.text: «Gobierna usted un protectorado entero; jamás se me ocurriría juzgarle basándome en un incidente aislado. Si le parece que le critico, es por la cara que tengo siempre. Y por la voz. Y también por las palabras que escojo. La verdad es que me cuesta mucho acostumbrarme a una conversación normal después de pasar tantos años en salas de interrogatorio...».
languages.original_text: "You are the ruler of an entire protectorate — I would not presume to judge you based on a single incident. If it seems like I am censuring you, that's just my face. And voice. And choice of words. It really is hard to readjust to normal conversation after so many years spent in interrogation rooms..."

traits.locale_text: «Gobierna usted un protectorado entero; jamás se me ocurriría juzgarle basándome en un incidente aislado. Si le parece que le critico, es por la cara que tengo siempre. Y por la voz. Y también por las palabras que escojo. La verdad es que me cuesta mucho acostumbrarme a una conversación normal después de pasar tantos años en salas de interrogatorio...».

languages.text: “你是整个王朝的统治者，我不会根据一件小事来评判你。如果你觉得我是在责备你，那恐怕是因为我始终板着脸，声音冷漠，言辞严厉。在审讯室里待了那么多年之后，真的很难再重新适应正常的谈话方式……”
languages.original_text: "You are the ruler of an entire protectorate — I would not presume to judge you based on a single incident. If it seems like I am censuring you, that's just my face. And voice. And choice of words. It really is hard to readjust to normal conversation after so many years spent in interrogation rooms..."

traits.locale_text: “你是整个王朝的统治者，我不会根据一件小事来评判你。如果你觉得我是在责备你，那恐怕是因为我始终板着脸，声音冷漠，言辞严厉。在审讯室里待了那么多年之后，真的很难再重新适应正常的谈话方式……”

languages.text: "Siz koca bir protektoranın hükümdarısınız. Tek bir olaya dayanarak sizi yargılamak haddime değildir. Sizi kınadığımı hissediyorsanız bunun sebebi yalnızca yüzüm, sesim ve kelime seçimim olabilir. Sorgu odalarında geçirilen onca yıldan sonra normal bir şekilde konuşmaya alışmak benim için gerçekten çok zor..."
languages.original_text: "You are the ruler of an entire protectorate — I would not presume to judge you based on a single incident. If it seems like I am censuring you, that's just my face. And voice. And choice of words. It really is hard to readjust to normal conversation after so many years spent in interrogation rooms..."
